description:
Focused on advocating for people who have suffered a personal injury, The Cagle Law Firm in Austin, Texas, has a reputation for getting results. We make it our mission not only to correct wrongdoing but also to see that clients receive the compensation necessary to recover. Our law firm focuses exclusively on personal injury law, serving clients in Austin and the surrounding areas. We specialize in the following areas:

  • Drunk driving accidents
  • Car and motorcycle accidents
  • 18-Wheeler and Commercial truck accidents
  • Spine and brain injuries
  • Wrongful death
  • Construction site accidents
  • Bicycle and pedestrian accidents
  • Birth Injuries
  • Medical Malpractice

The team at our law firm has earned a number of accolades, including holding an Avvo "Superb" rating; selected for inclusion in the Super Lawyers list; and receiving membership in the Million Dollar Advocates Forum and the Multi-Million Dollar Advocates Forum. Though these honors are a testament to our success, our law firm was built around the following values:

  • We treat clients as people, not just another case.
  • Our office provides free initial consultations.
  • The attorneys at our practice are highly experienced negotiators and litigators.
  • We operate on a contingency basis, which means we do not get paid unless our clients do.\

At The Cagle Law Firm, we are a full-service practice. Clients need only focus on healing while we handle the rest.
